Provided training on HIV/AIDs, food and transportation to ENAD members living with HIV. Source of fund was World Learning. 		200??
ከወርልድ ለርኒግ ባገኘው የገንዘብ ድጋፍ የማኅበራችን አባሎች የኢንተርኔት አገልግሎት ለማግኘት እንዲችሉ የ10 ኮምፒዩተሮች፣ አራት ላፕቶፖች፣ አንድ ቪዲዮ ካሜራ፣ ሶስት ሜዴረደሪያዎች እና የማኅበሪ መጸዳጃ ቤት በማሥራት ዕርዳታ አድርጓል፤
Provision of 10 desktop computers, four laptop computers, one video camera, one Canon EOS 7D digital photo camera, four CDMA dongles, one scanner, four shelves, one meeting table with six chairs, partitioning a portion of the ENAD Hall to serve as a cyber cafe and construction of the ENAD rest room. Source of fund was World Learning. 		200??
